sentences.sContent: The moves in chess are not only manifold, but involute.
sentences.sContent_eng: The moves in chess are not only manifold, but involute.
sentences.sCn: 下棋的走法不但多种多样， 而且错综复杂。

sentences.sContent: If we unwind this paper, each point on the angular edge generates an involute curve .
sentences.sContent_eng: If we unwind this paper, each point on the angular edge generates an involute curve .
sentences.sCn: 如果我们伸展这纸，每点在那之上有角的边缘产生一纷乱的曲线。

sentences.sContent: The shape of the tooth is an involute helicoid .
sentences.sContent_eng: The shape of the tooth is an involute helicoid .
sentences.sCn: 形状那牙齿是一纷乱的螺旋状的。

synos.tran: [生物]内卷的；纷乱的；错综复杂的

phrases.pCn: 渐开线齿形；渐开线齿廓

words.tran: [生物] 退化；纠缠（的事物）；乘方
涉及；使参与；包含（involve的过去式和过去分词）
